short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays embedded content, such as images, GIFs, and videos, in Yahoo Fantasy message boards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embeds media in Yahoo sports fantasy message boards.  All you need to do is include a link to the media you want to display in your post/message and YES (Yahoo Enhancement Suite) will embed the content for you automatically.  No more copying and pasting links!

Currently supports JPG/JPEG/PNG/GIF and YouTube videos.

YES simply embeds existing links to media on Yahoo's fantasy message boards and does not collect any user data.
